author: Special Correspondent
text:
Meeting to hear people’s grievances against the public distribution system will be organised all over Virudhunagar district on February 13, Saturday. According to a press release from Collector V. Rajaraman, the meeting will be held at Solaicheri in Rajapalayam taluk, Connoor of Srivilliputtur taluk, Anaikuttam in Sivakasi taluk; Kanchampatti of Sattur taluk, Chinniahpuram of Virudhunagar taluk, Therkkunatham of Aruppukottai taluk, Athikulam of Kariapatti taluk, Panaiyur of Tiruchuli taluk and Thulukkankurichi of Vembakottai taluk.

Public can air their grievances in the meeting in which officials of the Department of Civil Supplies and Consumer Protection will be present. Complaints against the PDS can be registered by dialling 9445000927 and 9445000353 or by sending a Whatsapp message to 9498188701, according to the press release.
title: PDS grievance meeting tomorrow
